title: DC Comics Superman Logo Adult Men's Board Shorts
features: Hit the pool or beach this summer with DC Comics superhero style!
Superman men's board shorts resemble the Man of Steel's outfit, featuring the red and yellow "S" logo on a blue background with red waist trim.
Comfortable 100% Polyester board shorts feature a mesh lining, drawstring elastic waist, Velcro fly and one back pocket
description: Hit the pool or beach this summer with DC Comics superhero style! These officially licensed DC Comics Superman men's board shorts resemble the Man of Steel's outfit, featuring the red and yellow "S" logo on a blue background with red waist trim. Comfortable 100% Polyester board shorts feature a mesh lining, drawstring elastic waist, Velcro fly and one back pocket. Adult sizes. Machine wash.
